channel.description: Recent content in Digital-Assets on >_ John Januszczak | Technology & Innovation

item.title: While the West Debated Whitepapers, We Were Shipping Stablecoins
item.author: john@januszczak.org (John Januszczak)
item.description: A reflection on the 2019 launch of PHX and the i2i platform, highlighting the gap between theoretical ’tokenization’ and the ground-level reality of financial inclusion in the Philippines.

item.title: PDAX
item.author: john@januszczak.org (John Januszczak)
item.description: The Philippines’ leading BSP-licensed digital asset exchange, backed by Tiger Global, which pioneered the tokenization of government treasury bonds for the mass market.
